Instruction: In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and sugars until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, ensuring each is well incorporated before adding the next. Mix in the vanilla extract.
Add eggs and vanilla to the mixture, and beat until well combined.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto the prepared cookie sheets, spacing them apart.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, until the edges are lightly browned. Let cool on the cookie sheets for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 15 to 18 minutes. Take them out of the oven and move to wire racks to cool.
